Conversation.value: Thanks for convincing all those people to join the police force. The phones...well phone...has been ringing off the hook since you started recruiting new police officers. I have something else I need help with if you have the time.

I really appreciate all your doing for the town, and me. We have a 911 switch board but its in bad condition, I need you to get me 3 spools of 20 gauge copper wire, 1 power supply, and 6 LEDs. You should be able to find everything in the woods were the old semiconductor once stood. I would go myself but those woods have communists in them and I have a family.

Event.eventValue: Collect 3 spools of wire, 6 LED's, and a backup power supply. Don't Let The Commies Touch You!

Conversation.value: We have a 911 switch board but its in bad condition, I need you to get me 3 spools of 20 gauge copper wire, 1 power supply, and 6 LEDs. You should be able to find everything in the woods were the old semiconductor once stood. I would go myself but those woods have communists in them and I have a family.

Event.eventValue: Collect 3 spools of wire, 6 LED's, and a backup power supply. Don't Let The Commies Touch You!

Response.value: Let me guess, I have to get doughnuts for everyone...

Conversation.value: ...I'm going to pretend I didn't hear that...get me 3 spools of 20 gauge copper wire, 1 power supply, and 6 LEDs. Don't come back till you have everything. You should be able to find everything in the woods were the old semiconductor once stood. I would go myself but those woods have communists in them and I have a family.

Event.eventValue: Collect 3 spools of wire, 6 LED's, and a backup power supply. Don't Let The Commies Touch You!
